A

addDisc(Grid, int) - Static method in class Controller.Contoller
This function can return the same Grid if no new Disc can be inserted or a new Grid with one more Disc at the appropriate colum
areFourConnected(int[][], int) - Static method in class Controller.Contoller
This checks if the player has won either vertically, horizontally, descending diagonally or ascending diagonally

C

Contoller - Class in Controller
Contains the functions that change the model
Contoller() - Constructor for class Controller.Contoller
 
Controller - package Controller
Provides functions to manage the contoller part of the MVC architecture
createContent(Grid) - Static method in class view.View
This function displays the gaming board
createMenu() - Static method in class view.View
This function creates the menu

G

getBoard() - Method in class model.Grid
 
getPlayerTurn() - Method in class model.Grid
 
Grid - Class in model
This class is the model for the gaming board and the players index It also provides getters and setters for it's components
Grid() - Constructor for class model.Grid
This constructor initializes an empty board with and points the index at the first player

I

Initialize - Class in Launcher

L

Launcher - package Launcher
Provides the functions to start the JavaFX application
Launcher - Class in Launcher

loadGame() - Static method in class Controller.Contoller
This function loads the game from a JSON file

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Launcher.Initialize
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class Launcher.Launcher
 
model - package model
Provides the model class for the application

S

saveGame(Grid) - Static method in class Controller.Contoller
This function saves the board and the current players index in a json file format
setBoard(int[][]) - Method in class model.Grid
 
setPlayerTurn(int) - Method in class model.Grid
 
showStage(int) - Static method in class view.View
This function displays a stage with a congratulating message to the winning player
start(Stage) - Method in class Launcher.Initialize
